name: The Hunt (Zork1)
body:
###Welcome to The Hunt!

This Game is about a detective who is following a serial murderer. According to the lasts evidences, the murderer is somewhere inside an old abandoned theme park. Get through the park and find the murderer before he finds you!

Check the wiki [here](https://github.com/danielolondriz/Zork1_Daniel_Olondriz/wiki)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
